name: JUST BAT (VR CRICKET)
description: JUST BAT is a revolutionary new VR CRICKET game that allows you to master the art of batting. An innovative new control system allows unrivalled control of shots in any style and direction. Set high scores and compete with others around the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 750 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i7-4790K Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 750 MB available space Sound Card: Any
